publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3052 Mr John Swinney: Powers of the Parliament—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Executive has not delivered the improvements in public services expected by the Scottish people; believes that the people of Scotland deserve better, and recognises that only with the full powers of independence will the Parliament have the ability to tackle and overcome Scotland’s core economic and social problems. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*
